cause.description:
I recently went on a mission trip to Monterrey Mexico through a group called Back2Back ministries and saw just how poverty stricken many are down there. I started to this cause to raise money to support Back2Back ministries and further mission trips.
1. Everyone has the right to live under a sturdy roof
2. Every child has the right to personal attention and love.
cause.mission: Relieving Poverty in Mexico through Back2Back ministries
cause.name: Support Back2Back Ministries in Mexico
